summary: Midbrain Activation course marketing app with management team (Aruna Mahajan, Mahesh Gujrati), WhatsApp contact (7330202733), and course-specific images
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Educational brain activation illustration with basic geometric patterns for Basic Intuition course (basic-intuition.dim_400x300.png)
- Advanced brain illustration with neural networks and energy patterns for Advanced Intuition course (advanced-intuition.dim_400x300.png)
- Sophisticated brain visualization with cosmic elements and advanced neural pathways for Super Advanced Intuition course (super-advanced-intuition.dim_400x300.png)

existing_features.title: Display management team names 'Aruna Mahajan' and 'Mahesh Gujrati' in the footer section of the application
Add WhatsApp contact number 7330202733 in a 'Contact Us' section in the footer
Add unique images for each of the three courses (Basic Intuition, Advanced Intuition, Super Advanced Intuition) and display them in the course cards

new_feature_requests.summary: Add management team names: Aruna Mahajan and Mahesh Gujrati
Add WhatsApp contact number 7330202733 in contact section
Add unique images for each course (Basic, Advanced, Super Advanced)
